column4: i have this installed from the ubuntu installer linux-image-2.6.15-27-386. my processor is an amd athlon xp 1800+. shouldn't i have this package instead? linux-image-2.6.15-26-k7
yes you should but it won't make much difference
i meant should i have this one linux-image-2.6.15-27-k7?
there is a linux-386, linux-686, linux-686-smp, but not a linux-k7. why not?
whats the correct way to change my kernel archeticture in ubuntu with all the kernel packages?
why not ? ask that to the Ubuntu developpers :)
